DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety efficacy long-term use pregabalin dose 600 mg/day patient painful diabetic peripheral neuropathy complete 13 week dose Study A0081163
DOC.brief_title: A Long-Term Study To Evaluate Safety And Efficacy Of Pregabalin For Pain Associated With Diabetic Peripheral Neuropathy
DOC.criteria: Patients complete 13week treatment painful diabetic peripheral neuropathy Study A0081163 .
